name: Minions & Monsters
summary: Laundry day goes cosplay when a Minion noob gets a seat at the table of some pro-role-playing gamers. Starting as a punching bag for monsters and punchline for peers, his perseverance unlocks bardacious skills just in time to save the day.
info:
• 中文名: 小黄人和怪兽
  • 动画制作: Illumination Entertainment

  • 片长: 5分钟
  • 导演: Jed Diffenderfer、Chloé Lesueur
  • 脚本: Jed Diffenderfer
